total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by the number 3 in the input grid.

Q3: Identify the pattern of transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q4: Apply the transformation pattern identified in Q3 to the cells identified in Q1 and Q2 in the quiz input grid.
